common.keyboardHint: Use arrow keys to navigate, ESC to close

welcome.title: Welcome to Literary Universe
welcome.content: Let's take a quick tour of your dashboard to help you get started with your writing journey.

topMenu.title: Main Navigation
topMenu.content: This is your main navigation menu. Let's go through each item.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.content: Your personal homepage with activity updates, and access to your workshop, library, and social features.

discovery.title: Discovery
discovery.content: Explore stories and universes created by other users. Read behind the scenes and in-depth blog posts from the authors. Find your next favorite read!

social.title: Social
social.content: Shared joy is 10x the joy! Find groups of like minded people, join our Discord and discover who else is on Literary Universe!

scratchpad.title: Scratchpad
scratchpad.content: Scratchpad is your personal notebook that is always available for you to jot down ideas, notes, and thoughts.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.content: Stay updated with comments, follows, and other community interactions.

messages.title: Messages
messages.content: Communicate with other writers, beta readers, and collaborate on projects.

profile.title: Profile
profile.content: Manage your personal information, preferences, and account settings.

workshop.title: Workshop
workshop.content: Your creative space for writing, editing, and managing your stories and universes.

library.title: Your Library
library.content: Access all your saved stories, reading lists, and downloaded content in one place.

leftMenu.title: Quick Access Menu
leftMenu.content: This sidebar provides quick access to important features and tools.

writerEncouragement.title: Ready to Create?
writerEncouragement.content: As a writer, your Workshop is where the magic happens! Start a new story, continue writing an existing one, or build out your universe. Your readers are waiting!

readerEncouragement.title: Ready to Explore?
readerEncouragement.content: As a reader, Discovery is your gateway to amazing stories! Explore new genres, follow your favorite authors, and build your reading lists. Happy reading!

welcome.title: Welcome to Literary Universe Workshop
welcome.content: Your Workshop is the heart of your creative journey on Literary Universe. Here you can create, manage, and collaborate on your stories and universes.

theWay.title: The Way of the Author
theWay.content: Track your progress as a writer with The Way of the Author. This gamified system helps you level up by completing writing milestones and engaging with the community. Click here to learn more about how it works.

ownWork.title: Your Creative Works
ownWork.content: Literary Universe offers multiple ways to express your creativity. You can create standalone stories, build expansive universes with interconnected tales, or write fan fiction inspired by other authors' worlds. Let's explore what you can create.

universe.title: Literary Universes
universe.content: Universes are the foundation of Literary Universe. They act as containers for your serialized stories that take place in the same literary universe. Universes offer powerful features like encyclopedias, blogs, forums, and more. You'll get the most out of Literary Universe by building universes for your interconnected stories.

story.title: Standalone Stories
story.content: These are self-contained stories that don't belong to any universe. Perfect for short stories, novellas, or tales that stand alone. You can also create stories within universes to benefit from being connected to a larger world with shared encyclopedias and community features.

fanfiction.title: Fan Fiction
fanfiction.content: Fan fiction lets you write stories in universes created by other authors. To create fan fiction, you need to add the universe to your library first. You'll have access to the universe's encyclopedia and community features, but you won't have write permissions to the original universe. Fan fiction also has limitations like no monetization.

collaborative.title: Collaborative Works
collaborative.content: This section shows all your collaboration invitations from other authors. You'll also see any works where you've accepted collaboration requests. Collaborate on universes and stories with other writers to build amazing worlds together.

translations.title: Translations
translations.content: Manage translation requests and your translation work here. Just like collaborations, this section shows translation invitations and accepted translation projects. You can also translate your own stories into other languages to reach a global audience.

betaReadings.title: Beta Readings
betaReadings.content: Beta reading gives you early access to stories and provides valuable feedback to authors. This section shows beta reading invitations and projects you're currently beta reading. Help other writers improve their work while getting early access to exciting new stories.

theWayFinish.title: Continue Your Journey
theWayFinish.content: Remember to check back here to see your progress on The Way of the Author. Keep writing, collaborating, and engaging with the community to level up! Now, let's start writing!
